summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding a real estate transaction involving Steve Marshal, who is seeking assistance with a property purchase in Bradford, NH. The emails discuss the closing date and the need for a title search, along with a warning about potential fraud in wire transfers.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is seeking assistance for a property purchase and has reached out to an attorney for help with the title search and closing process.

persons.name: Attorney at Law
persons.context: An unnamed attorney is involved in facilitating the title search and closing for Steve Marshal's property purchase.

connections.description: Steve Marshal has contacted the attorney to handle the title search and closing for his property purchase.

events.title: Property Closing
events.description: The closing for the property purchase is scheduled to take place.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is attempting to purchase a house in Bradford, NH.
The closing date for the property is set for December 13, 2019.
There is a warning about potential fraud related to wire transfers in the correspondence.
The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement is noted as November 19, 2019, despite the seller signing on November 20, 2019.
The attorney is admitted to practice in New Hampshire and Massachusetts.
